comments:

(even though the machine is newly booted)

This NPE is the result of the Ant view not being restored / initialized 
properly (see bug 25548).
Which build of Eclipse is this from? 
The more interesting thing for us is how did the Ant view get into this state?
can you provide a build file that gets the Ant view into trouble?

the behaviour suddenly disapeared, and i haven't seen it since. 
but when it was happening i got the npe from a lot of places in eclipse... i 
couldn't open preferences window either. 

after some more reboots (during one of which i had to delete the .lock file 
manually) the behaviour disapeared, and i have been unable to reproduce it 
since. 

i think it has something to do with bug 29961, since it started when i began to 
use xdoclet via ant in eclipse. (and therefore ran the antscipt very often) 

this on m4 

sincerely 
morten wilken
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 28855 ***
